instruction: Magnesium glycinate 400 mg at bedtime, no laxative effect.

attributes.note_to_pharmacist: Dispense 30 tablets for a 30-day supply. Allow 2 refills.

instruction: Baseline labs: potassium, magnesium, creatinine. One quick tube, no fasting required.

attributes.comment: Baseline labs ordered, no fasting required.

instruction: Keep pills on home-time during flights; maintain a twelve-hour gap if a leg crosses midnight.

attributes.comment: Keep pills on home-time during flights; maintain a twelve-hour gap if a leg crosses midnight.

instruction: Watch for side effects: jaw pain, hand-foot redness, mouth sores, or any flutter in the chest. Call before the next dose if these occur.

coding.display: Advice to report signs and symptoms

attributes.comment: Watch for side effects: jaw pain, hand-foot redness, mouth sores, or any flutter in the chest. Call before the next dose if these occur.

instruction: ECG with cardiology on the first Thursday of each month, five minutes, in and out.

attributes.narrative: ECG with cardiology on the first Thursday of each month, five minutes, in and out.
